# altitude

**Instance Property**

Vertical distance, in meters, between this anchor and sea level.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc var altitude: CLLocationDistance? { get }
```

## Discussion

Negative values indicate below sea level. This property is valid only when [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeoAnchor/altitudeSource-swift.property] is a value other than [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeoAnchor/AltitudeSource-swift.enum/unknown].

## Defining Altitude

- **altitudeSource**: A record of the source from which an altitude came.
- **ARGeoAnchor.AltitudeSource**: Options for setting a location anchor’s altitude.
